message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my unique product. It holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth may vary depending on your needs. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I propose a price of $150 for it. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget, and we can proceed with the transaction.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering your product. I appreciate the quality and uniqueness, but my budget allows me to only spend up to $100 for it. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.
